combat1.name: Normal Attack: Lightning Touch
combat1.descriptionRaw:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 4 lightning attacks that deal <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color> after a short casting time.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Gathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.
combat1.description:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 lightning attacks that deal Electro DMG.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Electro DMG after a short casting time.

Plunging Attack
Gathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Electro DMG upon impact with the ground.

combat2.name: Violet Arc
combat2.descriptionRaw: #Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away. {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} Releases a homing Lightning Orb. On hit, it deals Electro DMG and applies a stack of the Conductive status (max 3 stacks) to opponents in a small AoE. Hold After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby opponents. Deals great amounts of extra damage to opponents based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them, and clears their Conductive status. Electro Purple is the raiment of the Witch of Purple Rose.
combat2.description:
Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away.

Press
Releases a homing Lightning Orb.
On hit, it deals Electro DMG and applies a stack of the Conductive status (max 3 stacks) to opponents in a small AoE.

Hold
After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby opponents.
Deals great amounts of extra damage to opponents based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them, and clears their Conductive status.
combat2.flavorText: Electro Purple is the raiment of the Witch of Purple Rose.

combat3.name: Lightning Rose
combat3.descriptionRaw: Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding opponents and dealing Electro DMG. The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back opponents and deal Electro DMG throughout the ability's duration. This rose is beautiful, but beware its mortal thorns.
combat3.description:
Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding opponents and dealing Electro DMG.
The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back opponents and deal Electro DMG throughout the ability's duration.
combat3.flavorText: This rose is beautiful, but beware its mortal thorns.

passive1.name: Induced Aftershock
passive1.descriptionRaw: Hits by Charged Attacks apply <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color>'s Conductive status to opponents.
passive1.description: Hits by Charged Attacks apply Violet Arc's Conductive status to opponents.

passive2.name: Static Electricity Field
passive2.descriptionRaw: Opponents hit by <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Rose</color> have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.
passive2.description: Opponents hit by Lightning Rose have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.

passive3.name: General Pharmaceutics
passive3.descriptionRaw: When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.
passive3.description: When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.
